# Brian Kimball - Systems Engineer / Developer

## Identity
This is the personal website and technical blog of Brian Kimball, a Systems Engineer and Developer. The content focuses on full-stack development, systems architecture, IBM i (AS/400) modernization, cloud infrastructure, and DevOps.

## Core Topics
- **Systems Engineering:** High availability, datacenter installations, network mapping.
- **Web Development:** Astro, React, Node.js, Fastify, Hono.
- **IBM i Modernization:** Integrating legacy systems with modern stacks (Node.js, Knex.js).
- **Projects:** Case studies on personal and professional technical projects.

## Content Index

### Featured & Recent Articles
- [High Availability Strategies](/blog/high-availability) - Concepts and implementation of HA systems.
- [IBM i & LDAP](/blog/ibmi-ldap) - Integrating IBM i authentication with LDAP.
- [Knex.js with IBM i](/blog/knex-ibmi) - Using modern ORMs with DB2 on i.
- [React State Map](/blog/react-state-map) - Visualizing state management in React.
- [Tanstack Query & Hono](/blog/tanstack-hono) - Building type-safe APIs.
